channel.title: Pvcscape need ppls opinions [317] [minigames] [24/7] [update info]
channel.description:
i have started my old server back up that i was working on last year and would like people opining on it so far. its a pvp and eco based server all skills work. pets work 30%
also looking for some mods and 2 admins that would like to join out team.
webclient: https://www.mediafire.com/?7x076lpfxsm8a19
i have added more items has sof mini games bosses dung new areas new home ..ect
bugs known so far: selling to npc makes you reconnect going to tav makes you freeze cant pick up pet. have to log out to show back up in the inv again. banking all makes you reconnect.
UPDATES: 1.0.1A
cache is now in the client folder instead of the user folder.
cache folder no longer says nullcache when it was moved to client folder.
changed back ground to black when loading client.
changed some physical appearances now it doesn't show up as the old clients server photo wise.
UPDATES 1.0.0A
changed the destination to cache folder from the user folder to the client folder.

item.title: Pvcscape need ppls opinions [317] [minigames] [24/7] [update info]

wasnt asking how my adverting was wanted to what they thought about the server
[/quote]
Do you think that ANYONE would come to your server when they have no idea what kinda server this is?[/quote]
it says 317 in the title unless ppl dont know how to read or pay attention…

Read full topic
